prompt: Character: Newborn Mary, Background: Softly lit hospital room, Relation: Mary's young parents, Camera Pose: Overhead shot of the newborn in her mother's arms, HDR Description: The camera captures the moment of Mary's birth, focusing on her tiny form cradled in her mother's arms. Her parents' faces are filled with a mix of joy and exhaustion, their eyes brimming with tears of happiness.

Character: Toddler Mary, Background: Sunlit living room, Relation: Mary's parents, Camera Pose: Level shot capturing Mary's first steps, HDR Description: The camera captures Mary's first steps, her parents cheering her on from the background. Her giggles fill the room, echoing against the sunny backdrop of their living room.

Character: Five-year-old Mary, Background: School building, Relation: Mary's mother, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary and her mother, HDR Description: Mary, now five, starts her first day of school. Her small hand clutches her mother's tightly as they approach the imposing school building, her wide eyes reflecting a mix of fear and excitement.

Character: Teen Mary, Background: Crowded school science fair, Relation: Her science project, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary presenting her project, HDR Description: At a crowded school science fair, Mary presents her volcano project with a proud smile. The camera captures the dramatic eruption of her project, the crowd's appreciative applause echoing around her.

Character: Teen Mary, Background: Her bedroom, Relation: Nobody, Camera Pose: Close-up on Mary's face, HDR Description: Mary experiences her first heartbreak, sobbing into her pillow in the dim light of her bedroom. The camera captures the raw emotion on her face, the tears glistening on her cheeks.

Character: Teen Mary, Background: Diner, Relation: Customers, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary serving coffee, HDR Description: Mary works her first job at a diner. The harsh fluorescent lights illuminate her tired but determined smile as she serves coffee to the late-night customers.

Character: Teen Mary, Background: High school graduation, Relation: Graduating peers, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary throwing her cap, HDR Description: Mary graduates high school, her face lit up with hope and excitement. The camera captures her throwing her cap into the air, the joyous cheers of her peers surrounding her.

Character: Young adult Mary, Background: College dorm room, Relation: Roommate, Camera Pose: Wide shot capturing Mary moving in, HDR Description: Mary moves into her college dorm, the room small and bare. The camera captures her nervous and excited expression as she unpacks her belongings.

Character: Young adult Mary, Background: Library, Relation: Books and coffee, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary studying, HDR Description: Mary pulls an all-nighter in the quiet library. The camera captures her surrounded by stacks of books and cups of coffee, her determined expression hinting at the academic challenges ahead.

Character: Young adult Mary, Background: College graduation, Relation: Her family, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary receiving her degree, HDR Description: Mary, in her graduation gown, receives her college degree. The camera captures the proud expressions of her family cheering from the audience.

Character: Mary in her early 30s, Background: Office cubicle, Relation: Colleagues, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary in her cubicle, HDR Description: Mary starts her first professional job, sitting nervously in a cubicle under the sterile office lights. The camera captures her anxious glances at her new colleagues, highlighting the pressure of her new environment.

Character: Mary in her early 30s, Background: Wedding reception, Relation: Her future husband, Camera Pose: Close-up on Mary and her future husband, HDR Description: Mary meets her future husband at a friend's wedding, their eyes meeting under the soft, romantic glow of the reception hall. Their shared smiles hint at the blossoming love between them.

Character: Mary in her early 30s, Background: Wedding venue, Relation: Her husband, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary saying 'I do', HDR Description: Mary, in a simple but elegant wedding dress, says 'I do' under a canopy of twinkling fairy lights. The camera captures the tender exchange of vows, the couple's shared joy palpable.

Character: Mary in her early 30s, Background: Their first home, Relation: Her husband, Camera Pose: Wide shot capturing Mary and her husband, HDR Description: Mary and her husband move into their first home, a small but cozy house. The camera captures their joyful expressions and the anticipation of starting a new life together.

Character: Pregnant Mary, Background: Nursery, Relation: Her unborn baby, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary painting, HDR Description: Mary, pregnant, paints a nursery. The camera captures the soft pastel colors of the room and the promise of new life, reflected in Mary's tender touches to her belly.

Character: Mary in her late 40s, Background: Hospital room, Relation: Her newborn baby, Camera Pose: Close-up on Mary and her baby, HDR Description: Mary becomes a mother, holding her newborn baby in the hospital room. The camera captures her face filled with love and awe, the emotional intensity of the moment palpable.

Character: Mary in her late 40s, Background: Kitchen, Relation: Her family, Camera Pose: Wide shot capturing the morning chaos, HDR Description: Mary, now a busy mom, juggles work and family. The kitchen is a chaos of breakfast dishes and school projects. The camera captures Mary's multitasking in the heart of her family's morning routine.

Character: Mary in her late 40s, Background: School building, Relation: Her child, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary waving goodbye, HDR Description: Mary sends her child off to their first day of school. Her eyes well up with tears as she waves goodbye, the camera capturing the bittersweet moment of letting go.

Character: Mary in her late 40s, Background: Hospital room, Relation: Her ailing mother, Camera Pose: Close-up on Mary and her mother, HDR Description: Mary, under the harsh lights of a hospital room, says goodbye to her ailing mother. The camera captures the intimate moment, their hands tightly clasped, reflecting the strength and love between them.

Character: Mary in her late 40s, Background: Her child's room, Relation: Her memories, Camera Pose: Wide shot capturing Mary repurposing the room, HDR Description: Mary, now an empty-nester, repurposes her child's room into a home office. Her face is a mix of sadness and resolve, the camera capturing the transformation of the room and the transition in her life.

Character: Grandmother Mary, Background: Family gathering, Relation: Her grandchild, Camera Pose: Close-up on Mary and her grandchild, HDR Description: Mary becomes a grandmother, holding her grandchild for the first time. Her face lights up with joy and love as she cradles the baby, the camera capturing the precious bond between them.

Character: Retired Mary, Background: Her porch, Relation: Her morning routine, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary sipping coffee, HDR Description: Mary, now retired, enjoys a quiet morning on her porch, sipping coffee and watching the sunrise. The camera captures the serenity of her retirement, the peaceful morning light reflecting off her contented smile.

Character: Retired Mary, Background: Various travel locations, Relation: Her husband, Camera Pose: Montage of Mary and her husband exploring, HDR Description: Mary travels with her husband, their faces filled with wonder as they explore new cities and cultures. The camera captures a montage of their adventures, highlighting their shared joy in this new phase of life.

Character: Elderly Mary, Background: Hospital room, Relation: Her dying husband, Camera Pose: Close-up on Mary and her husband, HDR Description: Mary, in the soft glow of a hospital room, says goodbye to her husband. Her hand clutches his tightly, the camera capturing the raw emotion in her eyes as she faces the heart-wrenching farewell.

Character: Widow Mary, Background: Her garden, Relation: Her plants, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary gardening, HDR Description: Mary, now a widow, finds solace in her garden. Her hands are covered in dirt as she plants new flowers, the camera capturing the therapeutic nature of her gardening, reflecting the healing process in her life.

Character: 80-year-old Mary, Background: Family gathering, Relation: Her family, Camera Pose: Wide shot capturing Mary and her family, HDR Description: Mary celebrates her 80th birthday, surrounded by her family. Her face glows with happiness and love, the camera capturing the joyous celebration and the warm family bonds.

Character: Frail Mary, Background: Nursing home room, Relation: Her new environment, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary in her room, HDR Description: Mary, now frail, moves into a nursing home. Her room is small but cozy, her face a mix of sadness and acceptance. The camera captures her settling into the new phase of her life, reflecting her resilience and strength.

Character: Great-grandmother Mary, Background: Family gathering, Relation: Her great-grandchild, Camera Pose: Close-up on Mary and her great-grandchild, HDR Description: Mary, surrounded by her family, celebrates her great-grandchild's first birthday. Her face is filled with joy and love, the camera capturing the precious moment as she holds the baby, the generational bond evident.

Character: Old Mary, Background: Her room, Relation: Her old photos, Camera Pose: Medium shot capturing Mary looking at photos, HDR Description: Mary, in the quiet of her room, looks at old photos. Her face is filled with nostalgia and a hint of sadness, the camera capturing the bittersweet memories reflected in her eyes.

Character: Dying Mary, Background: Hospital room, Relation: Her family, Camera Pose: Overhead shot capturing Mary on the bed, HDR Description: Mary, under the soft glow of a hospital room, takes her last breath. Her face is peaceful, surrounded by her loving family. The camera captures the poignant moment, the end of her journey marked by the quiet tranquility in the room.
